pr_title: fix #2410 Add serialized wrappers for Sinks.Empty/Sinks.One

timeline.message: fix# 2410 Add serialized wrappers to SinkEmpty and SinkOne

timeline.author: bsideup

timeline.bodyText: I am wondering why IDEA renamed this class :D I think we should rename it back to keep the inner class names shorter
timeline.author: bsideup

replies.bodyText: to clarify, this should indeed be renamed back to TryEmitNextStressTest
replies.author: simonbasle

timeline.bodyText: same as in above @bsideup comment: rename back to TerminatedVsOnNextStressTest
timeline.author: simonbasle

timeline.message: fix# 2410 Add serialized wrappers to SinkEmpty and SinkOne
extract SerializedSink as an abstract class and make SerializedOne and SerializedEmpty extend from it
